pages.text: $(item)Corn$() is a common Vegetable Food item that can be grown by planting $(item)Corn Seeds$().$(br)Harvesting fully-grown corn yields from 1 to 5 corns and no seeds per crop harvested.$(br)$(item)Corn$() can be used in several $(pot)Crock Pot$() recipes like $(item)Fish Tacos$() and has a vegetable value of 1 in the recipes.

pages.title: Corn
pages.text: $(item)Corn$() will naturally generate in the Forest.
$(item)Corn Seeds$() can be crafted by the $(item)Corn$() in the Crafting Table.

$(item)Popcorn$() is a Vegetable Food item made by cooking $(item)Corn$().$(br)It restores more $(thing)Saturation Meter$() and less $(thing)Eating Duration$() compared to its raw counterpart.$(br2)It can also be used as an ingredient in several $(pot)Crock Pot$() recipes.
